TextPattern: ^Proof that the bearer has the authority to command (?P<unit_type>[a-zA-Z ]+).
^Proof that the bearer has the authority to command (?P<unit_type>[a-zA-Z]+) troops.
zh-tw: 持此令牌者可以指揮{unit_type}單位。
zh-cn: 持此令牌者可以指挥{unit_type}部队。

TextPattern: ^(?P<unit_type>Black Mountain Bandits|Enforcer Troop|Fury of Beihai|Han Provincial|House Servant|Jianan Vigilante|Local Noble|Southern Foreign|Tiger & Leopard|White Tiger|Yellow Turbans|Yuan Rong) (?P<unit_name>[-a-zA-Z ]+)
